response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you is $150, we propose to sell it to you for $140. This price reflects its true value while allowing us to maintain a fair margin. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and looks forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 140}
